Articles.Content:
I think he's kinda taking a hands-off approach on this mod. It's only been updated a few times, mostly just update compatibility stuff.

I don't think he'll go through the trouble to update it just to make a few different models, or change the fire rate, or the tracer colors.

Basically, you get what you get. (And you don't get upset)
That's a shame. This is the only MG mod out there! Could he at least turn it over to someone who will love it?

Like theflyingfish says, I have no intentions to add functionality to this unless there is a very good reason to do so. Many people seem to like it though so I'll keep it working.

If anyone wants to make more models for it they are free to do so, it's very straight forward and modeling for it is very similar to how vanilla engines works. A transform for the muzzle and casing ejection port and a emissive map like usual. If you have any questions on how something works/doesn't feel free to PM me here or the official KSP IRC.
I wish to add ammo (as a ship resource) to this. OK to do so?

Help, Mine won't fire I've tried changing it's key-bindings but yet when I load up KSP and go build something and when I choose it it Constantly does the sound and when I launch with everything I need, it simply doesn't work, a dead weight. I'd appreciate some help.
This mod is awesome. I might try to make a M2 out of this super fancy plugin.
Yes, PLEASE Make a M2!
Do you like my APC?

Help, Mine won't fire I've tried changing it's key-bindings but yet when I load up KSP and go build something and when I choose it it Constantly does the sound and when I launch with everything I need, it simply doesn't work, a dead weight. I'd appreciate some help.

How did you install this mod and are you running any other mods?
i cant get the gun to work help!!!!!!!!!!!

i cant get the gun to work help!!!!!!!!!!!

No one can help you as long as you are not describing the problem...

Do you like my APC?

Very much so, you should use infernal robotics to make the turret useful!

M2? Pwees?

(If Your workin on it?)

Hi all, im kinda new to changing gamefiles and what to look for in order to change a few things a bit more.

I was wondering, if it is possible to make the gattling gun rotate and how would one go about changing it? I have tried changing a few things in the cfg file to no avail. please help

The gatling gun DOES Rotate! Sometimes it will get stuck when the gun clips with parts, though.

(Welcome to the forums!)

The mod is absolutely awesome ! Excellent job there !

Now... after gattling guns, what about CANONS !?
I Want a 75mm Cannon, A 27mm Autocannon, And a M2 Browning! How hard can It be for someone who knows how to make mods? Just build it off this thing!

I Want a 75mm Cannon, A 27mm Autocannon, And a M2 Browning! How hard can It be for someone who knows how to make mods? Just build it off this thing!

Please see DYJ's license regarding derivative works
I know.. You cant copy other peoples stuff.. But Why cant DYJ Give this to someone if he is not gonna work on it?

The gatling gun DOES Rotate!

Could you tell us how you achieved that?

The Guns barrel rotates on its own when I fired it.. That's All I know.

..But that M2 Isnt happening, Is it?

The Guns barrel rotates on its own when I fired it.. That's All I know.

..But that M2 Isnt happening, Is it?

Lol ofcourse, i think what people mean with rotate is the entire gun being able to rotate horizontally, for aim

If you want to achieve that, just use damned robotics.

Lol ofcourse, i think what people mean with rotate is the entire gun being able to rotate horizontally, for aim

If you want to achieve that, just use damned robotics.

damned robotics is a little outdated, there is a new thread on there for these parts. I think it is called infernal robotics now. Done by magic smoke industries. I am using it and try to build giant crawling robots. though I stopped due to lags in my system of all the parts that i had to use. I really need a better PC.

* I looked up the link for the robotics. more information is on the damned robotics page aswell * Magic Smoke Industries - Infernal Robotics

Hi, that is what i mean in my earlier post. Sorry for not having been clear enought.

I did find that plugin-parts usefull in order to traverse and elevate the gun with hinges and rotatons.

Still trying to figure out if i could somehow get it to move almost like lazors systems mouse look, but point and click shoot the target
i cant seem to get it to work i installed it correctly and changed the fire key to f but it doesn't work
